title: Three killed, nine injured in road accidents in Balochistan - Pakistan - DAWN.COM
content:
QUETTA: Three people, including a woman, were killed and nine others injured in two separate road accidents in Chaman and Mach areas on Monday.

A pickup truck carrying a wedding party overturned near Chaman toll plaza, killing three people and injuring seven others, according to Levies officials.

Levies personnel reached the site and shifted the bodies and the injured to Chaman Hospital.

Meanwhile, two people were seriously injured when a motorcycle collided with a truck near the Mach area of Bolan, police said. The injured, identified as Amanullah and Abdul Khaliq, were taken to Mach District Hospital for treatment.

Published in Dawn, July 15th, 2025
